kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=foodie, url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

test.name: Register New Restaurant Successfully

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '101', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Spice Garden", "category": "Indian", "location": "North", "images": [], "contact": "98765"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants status=201, reason=CREATED headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.0.1 Python/3.11.0', 'Date': 'Wed, 11 Feb 2026 13:10:42 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '165', 'Connection': 'close'} body={ "approved": false, "category": "Indian", "contact": "98765", "enabled": true, "id": 4, "images": [], "location": "North", "name": "Spice Garden" }

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

test.doc: Verify admin can register a restaurant

test.name: Approve Restaurant Via Admin

kw.name: PUT On Session
kw.doc: Sends a PUT request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.doc: Verify admin can approve a registered restaurant

test.name: Search For Restaurant By Name

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Response : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants/search?name=Spice status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.0.1 Python/3.11.0', 'Date': 'Wed, 11 Feb 2026 13:10:46 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '188', 'Connection': 'close'} body=[ { "approved": true, "category": "Indian", "contact": "98765", "enabled": true, "id": 4, "images": [], "location": "North", "name": "Spice Garden" } ]

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

test.doc: Verify user can search for restaurants

kw.name: DELETE On Session
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants/4 path_url=/api/v1/restaurants/4 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
